channel.title: Installing on Ampretia:Dev

item.title: Windows, Virtual Box, and CentOS
item.description: My personal preference for developing is to use Windows 10 as my laptops main OS, but then run VirtualBox with Linux. Succiently this is because I like to have office style applications available, and as a general ‘just do stuff’ Windows does the job well Should something go wrong developing, it’s quite easy to through the VM away and start again. Or if you want to test a certain machine configuration.
